title: Pixel 4a music streaming issues on bluetooth and android auto since android 11 update
content: We've had 2  Pixel 4a for 5 days on "10" before "11" update. Streaming via android auto on 2018 Dodge and bluetooth 2014 Civic was flawless. Since update both cars audio drops out and apps lock up. I tried to write detailed description but repeatedly failed to post "content violates community policy ???)
